focus: Hidden messages and symbols in artworks
narrative_style: A code-breaking adventure revealing the true meanings behind artistic symbols
clue_style: Symbolic hints, e.g., 'A skull in this painting warns of life's impermanence...'
question_style: Focused on interpreting visual symbols in historical context
intention: Decode artistic messages hidden in artworks
general_description: A game where players uncover the secret meanings and messages hidden in art.
